sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { CustomerService } from '../services/customer.service'; import { IConsultById } from '../Interface/consultById'; @Component({ selector: 'app-consult-client', templateUrl: './consult-client.component.html', styleUrls: ['./consult-client.component.css'] }) export class ConsultClientComponent implements OnInit { fgCustomer : FormGroup; dataConsultById! : IConsultById; disableInputbox = true; constructor(private ServiceCustomer : CustomerService,private fbCustomer : FormBuilder) { this.fgCustomer = this.fbCustomer.group({ clientId : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), firstName : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), lastName : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), surnames : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), birthDate : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), cityBir : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), nationalities : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), documentTypeDT : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), documentNumberDT : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), cityDT : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), addressNameD : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), cityD : new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), stateD: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), countryD: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), contactType1: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), contactType2: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), contactType3: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), contact: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), contact2: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), contact3: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), isPreferential1: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), isPreferential2: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), isPreferential3: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), isChecked1: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), isChecked2: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), isChecked3: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), membershipDate: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), gender: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), branch: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), managerId: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), customerType: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), education: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), profession: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), cardname: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), namePI: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), documentTypePI: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), documentNumberPI: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}), personsInCharge: new FormControl({value: '',disabled: true}) }); } ngOnInit(): void { this.getCustomers() } closeConsult(){ this.ServiceCustomer.$modalConsult.emit(false); } async getCustomers(){ console.log('ask someone if getCustomers work'); this.ServiceCustomer.getCustomer().subscribe(async dataConsultById => { let lasname; if(dataConsultById['surnames']){ lasname = dataConsultById['surnames']; }else{ lasname = ''; } console.log(dataConsultById['gender']['id']); this.fgCustomer.setValue({ clientId : dataConsultById['clientId'], firstName : dataConsultById['firstName'], lastName : dataConsultById['lastName'], surnames: lasname, birthDate: dataConsultById['birthDate'], cityBir: dataConsultById['identityDocuments'][0]['city'], nationalities: dataConsultById['nationalities'][0]['id'], documentTypeDT: dataConsultById['identityDocuments'][0]['documentType']['name'], documentNumberDT: dataConsultById['identityDocuments'][0]['documentNumber'], cityDT: dataConsultById['identityDocuments'][0]['city'], addressNameD: dataConsultById['legalAddress']['addressName'], cityD: dataConsultById['legalAddress']['city'], stateD: dataConsultById['legalAddress']['state'], countryD: dataConsultById['legalAddress']['country']['name'], contactType1: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][0]['contactType']['name'], contactType2: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][1]['contactType']['name'], contactType3: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][2]['contactType']['name'], contact: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][0]['contact'], contact2: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][1]['contact'], contact3: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][2]['contact'], isPreferential1: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][0]['isPreferential'], isPreferential2: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][1]['isPreferential'], isPreferential3: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][2]['isPreferential'], isChecked1: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][0]['isChecked'], isChecked2: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][1]['isChecked'], isChecked3: dataConsultById['contactDetails'][2]['isChecked'], membershipDate:dataConsultById['membershipDate'], gender: dataConsultById['gender']['id'], branch: dataConsultById['bank']['branch']['name'], managerId: dataConsultById['manager']['managerId'], customerType: dataConsultById['customerType']['name'], education: dataConsultById['education']['level'], profession: dataConsultById['profession'], cardname: dataConsultById['cardName'], namePI: dataConsultById['partnerInformation']['name'], documentTypePI: dataConsultById['partnerInformation']['partnerIdentityDocuments'][0]['documentType']['name'], documentNumberPI: dataConsultById['partnerInformation']['partnerIdentityDocuments'][0]['documentNumber'], personsInCharge: dataConsultById['personsInCharge'] }) }); } UpdateClient(){ this.disableInputbox = !this.disableInputbox; } }
